February 26, 2022
hoojeebo
See, this is the problem with a low number of people commenting on and/or rating figures, as this is currently sitting at 2 stars, which it doesn't deserve. Sure, it doesn't have any move and attack, but it's a 40-point Skrull grunt with some great powers, good stats, and the potential to heal. Just a few years ago this would have been unheard of. Even without move and attack, this figure is a great way to fill points on a Skrull army.
